title: 03/21/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/21/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the tournament games from over the weekend. Which games stood out to him? Michigan State's Head Basketball Coach Tom Izzo checks in after bowing out to Duke. Did he have any issues with how the game was officiated? And Carson Palmer discusses if there should be any football concerns with Deshaun Watson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
